item.title: ISO 19650 on SharePoint: Why a Policy-Driven App Beats Power Automate-Only
item.description:
ISO 19650 on SharePoint: Why a Policy-Driven App Beats a “Power Automate-Only” Approach

Many construction and infrastructure organizations want an ISO 19650â€“aligned Common Data Environment (CDE) while keeping data inside Microsoft 365. SharePoint provides the underlying document management platform, and Power Automate is often used to stitch processes together. In practice, however, an ISO 19650 CDE requires more than automation steps: it requires governance, repeatability, enforceable rules, and predictable user experience at scale.
